lead_paragraph: TILZER-RHODES--Louise. NewYork-Presbyterian mourns the death of Louise Tilzer-Rhodes, beloved wife of our Life Trustee William R. Rhodes. A beautiful woman of grace and elegance, Louise will be deeply missed by all who knew her. We extend our deepest sympathies to Bill, her daughter Jessica and all of Louise's loved ones. Frank A. Bennack, Jr., Chairman of the Board of Trustees Steven J. Corwin, MD, President and CEO Herbert Pardes, MD, Executive Vice Chair of the Board of Trustees NewYork-Presbyterian 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TILZER, RHODES, LOUISE
